valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 5 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low eastern England 1002 moving steadily northeastwards and losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
Southerly or southwesterly backing southeasterly, then veering westerly later, 2 to 4.
Sea state
Moderate, becoming slight or moderate.
Weather
Showers, perhaps thundery, becoming fair later.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor until later.
